trans-unit.source: Abstract class that represents a keyboard device.
trans-unit.target: 代表鍵盤裝置的抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardDevice supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardDevice 支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For keyboard related input, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 相關的鍵盤輸入，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class represents the keyboard to an application and provides methods, properties, and events that reflect the state of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>類別代表鍵盤應用程式，並提供方法、 屬性和事件，以便反映鍵盤的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class delegates to the appropriate KeyboardDevice.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>類別委派至適當的 KeyboardDevice。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice> object represents one particular input device.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice>物件都代表一個特定的輸入的裝置。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice>

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are two mice, there will be two <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果有兩個滑鼠，會有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The input manager associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 與此相關聯的輸入的管理員<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>報告此裝置的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The source of input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 此裝置的輸入來源。

trans-unit.source: Clears focus.
trans-unit.target: 清除焦點。

trans-unit.source: The ClearFocus method sets the focus to `null`.
trans-unit.target: ClearFocus 方法將焦點設定到`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when restoring focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的行為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]還原焦點時。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] when restoring focus.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，指定的行為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]還原焦點時。

trans-unit.source: The default in <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的預設值<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets keyboard focus on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將鍵盤焦點設在指定<xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The element to move focus to.
trans-unit.target: 將焦點移到項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 具有鍵盤焦點的項目。

trans-unit.source: element is not a or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a or .

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有鍵盤焦點的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 具有鍵盤焦點的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of key states for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的按鍵狀態集<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The set of key states for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 重要狀態的指定索引鍵的集合。

trans-unit.source: key is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: key不是有效的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, obtains the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyStates"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會取得<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyStates"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The set of key states for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 重要狀態的指定索引鍵的集合。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref> is in the down state.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>處於關閉狀態。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: if key is in the down state; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 key 處於已按下狀態; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: key is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: key不是有效的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref> is in the toggled state.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>中切換的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: if key is in the toggled state; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 key 處於 已切換之狀態; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: key is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: key不是有效的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref> is in the up state.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>處於最新狀態。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: if key is in the up state; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 key 處於向上狀態; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: key is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: key不是有效的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref> which are currently pressed.
trans-unit.target: 取得一組<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>目前按下它。

trans-unit.source: The set of modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 修飾詞的索引鍵集。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that input from this device is sent to.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定<xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref>來自此裝置的輸入會傳送至。

trans-unit.source: The target for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice> is the object that has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice>是具有鍵盤焦點的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that receives input.
trans-unit.target: 收到輸入的項目。
